title: Cinematic Trailers Music Pack
description: This brand new collection of Cinematic Trailer music and loops is sure to add dramatic flair to your game and/or trailer.
longDescription:
This brand new collection of Cinematic Trailer music and loops is sure to add dramatic flair to your game and/or trailer. With 10 distinct themes and over 30 separate looping tracks of varying dynamic and length, this pack provides over 40 minutes of music. Full length versions are perfect for trailers or credits, while the Looping versions work great for gameplay, menus, etc.Â 

LISTEN HERE

technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • 45 music cues
  • Full length and looping versions for most cues
  • Loop variations

Number of Audio Wavs: 45

Number of Audio Cues: 45

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz/16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 45

Supported Development Platforms: ALL

Supported Target Build Platforms: ALL
